post.body: V happy 4U; maintain that trend-line!
Hmm. For us, most of the rest is close, but the dessert—not even started! Where are my priorities?
all baked, all fridged; awaiting future. Nighty-night!
turns out last night's libation was 2007 Senorio de Barahonda Yecla Carro Tinto Bellum (Spanish red)
No chance of snow, but that's not particularly comforting.
yawning; ∴ off to bed
waiting for the bison meatloaf to get cooked; trying to remember book for discussion tonight—read it 6 weeks ago!
getting ready to try a new chicken recipe
listening to the news; queasy expectations for runoff reports tonight
yawning to a quiet house and kitchen chockablock with leftovers…yum!
waiting for turkey to get half cooked, so I can decide how to prep it for the last hour, while cooking cranberries, etc.
beer in bottles (almost!)
I'm concerned about the verb "heaving" being tossed about here….
No stumpers here (fine w/me). Robo calls on judges, but that's all (that I've caught).
Off to prepare sweet potato appetizer & trim brussels sprouts…
I don't like it when it's windy out, like now.
Just ate b'fast watching mockingbird in backyard, busy busy perhaps autumnal busy
Enjoying the quiet; tradesmen left early (three crews here midday made for lots of tromping then, though)….
Try this: http://tinyurl.com/5jxs9k
(proudly) just restarted after doing software updates
